titles.title: Defense Acquisition Workforce Human Capital Management Improvement Act of 2016

A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to require reports to Congress on matters of the military departments and Defense Agencies in support of the biennial strategic workforce plans of the Department of Defense.
Defense Acquisition Workforce Human Capital Management Improvement Act of 2016

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

bill.summary:
Defense Acquisition Workforce Human Capital Management Improvement Act of 2016
This bill requires the Department of Defense (DOD) strategic workforce plan to include information on the use of certain special hiring authorities by the military departments and the defense agencies, and a description of the additional authorities required to enhance DOD's civilian employee workforce.
DOD shall transmit to Congress each report submitted to DOD by the military departments and the heads of the defense agencies relating to the strategic workforce plan.
